at.usmile.cormorant.framework.module

Class DecisionModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.usmile.cormorant.framework.module.DecisionModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginManager.OnChangeListener

    public class DecisionModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluginManager.OnChangeListener
    Behavior is customizable by using different DecisionStrategy implementations. Polls data from plugins based on a given pollingInterval from the used DecisionStrategy. If a plugin has changed it will trigger the FusionModule. The decision making process is started from the FusionModule after the data has been fused.
